name: Kamus Sihir - Belajar Kosakata Jepang
description:
Kamus Sihir is an educational games that teaches Japanese word through word typing gameplay.

It's in Bahasa Indonesia.

The player are going to help Lis, a mage apprentice who accidentally opens a magic book that spawns items, putting those items back inside the book.

This is a single player game and doesn't requires internet connection.
